survey_name: Music Streaming Service User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user preferences, satisfaction levels, and pain points with current music streaming services to help improve future offerings.

questions.question_text: Which music streaming service(s) do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkbox format for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with text field for custom responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with 'Other' option triggering text input.

script.question_text: Which music streaming service(s) do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary music streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: Display for all respondents who selected at least one service in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Consider randomizing scale order for some respondents to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons), display logic based on Q1 selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary music streaming service?
script.routing_logic: Display for all respondents who selected at least one service in Q1

questions.question_text: What is the most important feature when choosing a music streaming service?
questions.client_notes: Use single-choice with 'Other' option. Consider adding a follow-up open-ended question for 'Other' selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with 'Other' option triggering text input.

script.question_text: What is the most important feature when choosing a music streaming service?

questions.question_text: How often do you discover new music through your streaming service's recommendations?

questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale. Consider including a 'Not applicable' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons), display logic based on Q1 selection.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your music streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: Display for all respondents who selected at least one service in Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Use a text box with word limit (e.g., 250 words).
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT, display logic based on Q1 selection.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your music streaming service?
script.routing_logic: Display for all respondents who selected at least one service in Q1

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for higher audio quality (e.g., lossless audio)?
answer_options: Maybe, depending on the price difference

questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge willingness to pay. Consider follow-up questions about specific price points for those who select 'Maybe'.
